text:
Yo PR!!!! bs aise hi hall 1 me milte the roz apan(baakiyo ne bhot fraud maara h hall 1 aane meğŸ¤¬)

Tu akeli thi jisko parties yaad hogi mere alawa kyunki sober rehti thi(kyu???!!!) puri team ki harkate humne dekhi hğŸ˜‚, agli baar peeni pdegi tujhe bhi, no excuses...Holi pr utni acchi party shayad hi fir kbhi ho

Bhot late mile yaar apan vrna aur maze krte, jaldi hi milte hai, team party bhi pending hai!ğŸ»
author: Piyush  Gupta

text:
Awasthi bhai, bs formality k liye likh rha hu memoir kyunki apni college life shabdo me nahi describe kr skte

First year udghosh hospi se dosti hui aur fir chalti hi gyi, udghosh k kaand, antaragni k maze aur Techkriti me kaam, har jagah saath tha tu, I knew you always had my back. Aur bhai fest me teams se pange lena band kr, kahi maar vaar padd jayegiğŸ˜‚ But tu hospi god ban gaya tha first year me hi, itna kaam kiya ki third year tk aate aate tabiyat hi kharab hogyi

Aur bhai heavy coder toh tu hai hi, I know you'll disagree but still. Aur saale startup me kaam krva diya kr, "tu beer hai behenchod"-TVF Pitchers, aur jb ideas btau toh bilkul negative mt ho jaaya krğŸ»

Tu bacha hua hai vaise abhi tk, jis din tere ghar valo se hum mil liye, sb kaand bta denge tere(jo tune nahi kiye hai vo bhi)ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ Aur tu jitna seedha banta hai, I know kitna harami h tu saale. Capacity toh teri hai nahi, oregano k nashe krna band krde vrna doctor ko bhi smjh nahi ayega ki ilaaj kaise kre

Goa trip mast thi bhai, pr bc stop trying to kill us!! Aur gin and tonic ka combo is the best for you, yaad rkhna and you're welcome for all your good pictures I clicked

We have had so many long calls and intellectual discussions maybe because we understand each other's point of view. Pandit, awasthi, hospi god, harami ya jo bhi ho, bhai hai tuâ¤ï¸, sbse reliable banda hai(bail krva dena bhai just in caseğŸ˜…)
author: Piyush  Gupta

text:
Saini, that's how everyone knows you kyunki bc tera naam hi itna common hai. First year se hi bakchodi kr rahe h apan pr abhi tk khtm nahi hui(bc wing repi bna diya mujhe, bta toh dete hota kya h)

Teri first year ki immaturity, playfulness, PJs, terrible dressing sense, chapri hairstyle se lekr 4th year ki maturity, seriousness, PJs and still chapri harkato tk sb dekha hai maine. Aur tujhe kitna bhi lage ki I am irritated ya I do not like to talk about stuff, I will be there for you whenever you need bhaiâ¤ï¸

Nov'18 me Saini ko chhod kr gye the, bc Jan'19 me koi aur hi mila, ya toh alien abduction hogya tha tera ya chudail ka saaya, whatever you want to say pr uske baad kaafi sad phase me rha tu and I hated seeing you like that, khush rha kr aur thoda overthinking km kr

Tu wing ki glue tha bhai, sbko jod kr rkha tune 4 saal, teri bakchodiya, harkate, non-sense jokes ab miss krta hu, hopefully college k baad bhi continue rkhega tu ye sb, pr bc ye gathe vaali rumours failana band krğŸ¤¬

Techkriti me bhi memories hai apni and Trip pending hai aur bhot saari parties and memories bhi, stay in touch bhai.

PS. If you are reading this years after college and do not have tears in your eyes, please cry because college Saini would have!
author: Piyush  Gupta

text:
Apni dosti me formality toh bachi nahi pr ye memoir vali kr lete hai, lifetime yaad rhegi

First year me tujhe gaali dene sunne me problem thi aur ab dekho, bina gaali k convo pura nahi hota terağŸ˜‚ 
Apan ne kaam k saath bhot maze bhi kiye fests me, itne nightouts, itne kaand(sbko nahi btana vrna degree latak jayegi) 

Movies ki tarah impromptu plan bna kr trip krna tere saath hi possible hai bhai, aur trips bhi kya bakchod ki hai apan ne, although agli baar se koshish krenge ki police se interaction na hi hoğŸ˜† 
Thanks bhai goa me sbko sambhalne k liye, meri mehnat km hogyi

Aur bhai third year techkriti se jo saath hua h, itni epic stories, kaand aur parties ki pucho mt Zindagi me chutiyap km kiya kr, meri baat sun lega toh km ho hi jayenge vaise(shayad!ğŸ˜›) Fb pr video calls krna band kr, theek harkate nahi h yeğŸ˜‚  

Tu sbse pure hearted aur kaafi reliable banda hai, aisa hi rehna. Bakchodi aside, tu dost se bhai bn gya hai, isse zyada toh nahi smjha paunga mai apni dosti koâ¤ï¸
author: Piyush  Gupta

text:
To whoever is reading this, bhai mera heera hai, thoda time do tumhe bhi pata chal jayega.

In these four years, you have been a constant, more so than others. Pareshan aatma hai tu, chill maara kr thoda, tu jaisa hai badhiya hai, remember that. 

First year wingie, second year roomie aur mera bhai. 
Mere 90% courses tune pass kraye hai, rest 10% I had to manage myself kyunki you didn't take those courses(insert abuses)

Ye memoir vgrah toh theek hai we still have memories to make, college khtm hoga, dosti nahi

Also, for future references, if I am sleeping peacefully, don't wake me up to ask if I want proxy attendance, the answer is NO! 
PS. Utkarsh, Diprasom aur apan dono ko sem k aakhri din proxy lagane ka khayal kyu aaya kbhi smjh aaye toh btana
author: Piyush  Gupta

text:
Bhai sbse chaalu(read harami) banda h tu wing ka, innocent act krta hai pr hai sbse kameena. First year hospi, fir HEC elections, fir PHY103(zarurat se zyada padh liye apan) ğŸ˜‚

Pta nahi kitne bulla session hue h bhai apne, teri bday GPL yaad rhegi mujhe, puri wing k maze lete the apan especially saini k (ab lagta h iski har kisi ne li hai) aur yadu k saath vale kaand alagğŸ˜

Pehle toh tune drams me itna chaapa aur maze kiye, fir jb hum logo ne maze krne chalu kiye tb tu maggu hogya bc, elections k kaand degree milne k baad discuss krengeğŸ˜‰

Kota aaya tha tb mast maze kiye bhai apan ne, aate raha kr, yaha ka saara intezaam mai kr dunga

Thoda touch me rha kr, padhai toh chalti rhegi!!â¤ï¸
author: Piyush  Gupta

text:
Bhai, kaha se shuru kru smjh nahi aa rha

First year antaragni hospi se dosti hui, fir jo kaand aur kisse hue hai apne saath vo epic hai, tera HEC election, ladkiya approach krna, second year hospi(vo toh tujhe acche se yaad hi hoga), Delhi trip, unlimited parties aur bhot kuch jo hume yaad nahi kyunki hum bhand theğŸ˜… Same fest ki core team me nahi rahe apan unfortunately

Fir baad me tu kameena hogya vo baat alag hai but thanks for being there when i needed, tu ek banda tha jispr I relied without a doubt. Pakka banker hogya h ab toh tu, nashe thode km kiya kr aur touch me rehnaâ¤ï¸
author: Piyush  Gupta
